statements: SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title FROM Artists WHERE artwork_year > 2000;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_year, artwork_medium FROM Artists WHERE artist_style = 'Impressionism';
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, artwork_price FROM Artists WHERE artwork_price < 1000.00;
SELECT artist_name, artist_style FROM Artists WHERE artist_name LIKE '%van Gogh%';
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE artwork_year > 2000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC, artwork_year DESC
SELECT artist_name, artist_style, artwork_title, artwork_year FROM Artists WHERE artist_style = 'Impressionism' ORDER BY artwork_year DESC
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, artwork_year, artwork_price FROM Artists WHERE artist_name LIKE 'V%' ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artwork FROM Artists GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_artwork > 2 ORDER BY total_artwork DESC
SELECT artist_name, AVG(artwork_price) AS avg_price FROM Artists GROUP BY artist_name HAVING avg_price > 5000 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, country FROM Artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT title, year_created, medium FROM Artworks WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT artist_name, birthdate FROM Artists WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT artist_name, title, year_created FROM Artists INNER JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id;
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT artist_name, year_created FROM Artists INNER JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id WHERE Artists.artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, country FROM Artists WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Artworks WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY year_created ASC, artist_id DESC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(artwork_id) AS num_artworks FROM Artists INNER JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(artwork_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, biography FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 5
SELECT artist_name, biography FROM Artists WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Picasso%'
SELECT artwork_title, price FROM Artworks WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM Exhibitions
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY artist_id DESC;
SELECT artist_name, biography FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM Exhibitions WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT artwork_title, creation_year, medium, price FROM Artworks WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY creation_year DESC, artwork_title ASC;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, creation_year FROM Artists INNER JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo Da Vinci';
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, birth_year FROM Artists WHERE country = 'France';
SELECT artwork_name, creation_year, genre FROM Artworks WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, country FROM Artists WHERE birth_year > 1800 ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_price, sale_date FROM ArtworkSales ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT artist_name, birth_year, country FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Artworks WHERE genre = 'Abstract' ORDER BY creation_year DESC;
SELECT artwork_name, sale_price, sale_date FROM Artworks JOIN ArtworkSales ON Artworks.artwork_id = ArtworkSales.artwork_id WHERE sale_price > 1000;

SELECT a.artist_name, Count(ai.image_id) AS image_count FROM Artists a LEFT JOIN Artworks aw ON a.artist_id = aw.artist_id LEFT JOIN ArtworkImages ai ON aw.artwork_id = ai.artwork_id GROUP BY a.artist_name HAVING image_count > 5;
SELECT artist_name, country FROM Artists WHERE birth_year BETWEEN 1800 AND 1900 ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM Artists ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT artwork_name, medium, price FROM Artworks WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT exhibition_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM Exhibitions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT artist_name, nationality, bio FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'French' OR nationality = 'Spanish';
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artists WHERE birth_date < '1970-01-01';
SELECT exhibition_name, location FROM Exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT artist_name, artwork_name, medium, price FROM Artists JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id WHERE Artists.nationality = 'French' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(artwork_id) AS num_artworks FROM Artists LEFT JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_artworks > 5;
